title: Lighting for television
creator_credit: Centre for Educational Television Overseas and Mavis Lock
brief_description: An introduction to the problems and possibilities of television lighting, including the techniques of three and four point lighting. The base lighting of a face is analysed by means of a miniature studio. The problems of contrast lighting and the translation of color into black and white are dealt with, and the need for the producer’s cooperation is stressed.
